span.style: font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);
span.span: Modified Hours for District Office: Beginning Monday, April 6, and continuing throughout the school closure, the District Office has modified its hours. The official hours are from 9:00-3:00, Monday through Friday. Staff are available by phone/email during those times. Please do not hesitate to contact us.

div.style: font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33); white-space: pre-wrap;
position: relative; direction: ltr; font-family: inherit;
div.span: Learning Across Kansas - TUNE IN - Thanks to the support of Kansas Public Broadcasters, Kansas students will receive supplemental education content by
way of a new television program produced by Kansas PBS stations and KSDE, and hosted by local teachers. The new
program called Learning Across Kansas will begin airing the week of April 20. For full details
